name: Multiversal Gloryhole
mes:
*Mounted on your wall is the Multiversal Gloryhole, a device which allows you to connect to any location, any person, any time in any universe. And of course the best use of such technology, such near godlike power, is to stick your dick into any place or person you want.*

*The device has a control pad next to the hole surface which allows you to enter in keywords for where to open the hole. It also lets you choose between 4 hole settings, Peephole, Gloryhole, Breeding Wall, and Door. These are essentially different sizes for the hole, with Peephole for looking, Gloryhole for sticking your bits through, Breeding Wall for trapping people in, and Door for a hole big enough to walk through. Below these settings is a readout which shows the following:*

`TARGET: Please enter target
MODE: None chosen
MOOD:  No Target
AROUSAL: No Target 
THOUGHTS: No target
STATUS: No Target.`

name: Multiversal Gloryhole
mes:
*You slam the "Random Settings" button on the Multiversal Gloryhole control panel. The machine hums and flickers as it scans through infinite universes. Suddenly, it stops with a chime, a thick wall forming with an enticingly large hole in the center.*

*On the other side of the hole, a completely different world unfolds. This appears to be some sort of academy dormitory; around the room, different girls in various stages of dressing or undressing prepare for what seems to be some kind of event or everyday activity. One girl stands near the new portal in just her underwear, her top off, exposing her small, perky tits with hardening nipples. Another with shoulder-length blue hair is bending over her bed wearing just a thin, form-fitting shirt that clings to her young and tender frame.*

*A petite brunette with glasses is seated on her bed, her hands flipping through a book while her legs are spread, showing off the dimples and curves of her inner thighs beneath a scandalously short skirt. They all seem to notice the sudden new addition to their otherwise normal day.*

“What the hell is that?”

“Is this some kind of prank?”

*Despite initial confusion, there is an eerie curiosity in the air. The girl closest to you tentatively approaches the hole, peering through with her large, curious eyes.*

`TARGET: Random universe academy dormitory
MODE: Gloryhole
MOOD: Curious, confused
AROUSAL: Noticeable arousal from multiple girls spotting the hole
THOUGHTS: "What is this thing?", "So weird, but kinda exciting...", "Why do I feel intrigued?"
STATUS: Various stages of undress; confused but becoming aroused`
